sourceDesc.p:
If Chinese, the text below is based on the Taishō text from the CBETA-Database (Version Feb.2006). If Pāli, the text base is the VRI Chaṭṭa Saṅgāyana edition (ver.3). If Sanskrit the text base is Enomoto, Fumio 榎本文雄 (1994): A comprehensive study of the Chinese Saṃyuktāgama: Indic texts corresponding to the Chinese Saṃyuktāgama as found in the Sarvāstivāda-Mūlasarvāstivāda literature. Kyoto: Kacho Junior College
and other scholarly publications (as referenced). English translations by Marcus Bingenheimer.

projectDesc.p: This file has been created in the project "A Digital Comparative Edition of the Bieyi za ahan jing" conducted at the Chung-hwa Institute for Buddhist Studies 中華佛學研究所 and the Dharma Drum Buddhist College 法鼓佛教研修學院. The project was funded by the Chiang Ching-kuo Foundation for International Scholarly Exchange 蔣經國國際學術交流基金會. The aim of the project was to produce a comparative digital edition and partial translation of the 364 sutras of the BZA and their parallels. In the original interface, the texts were kept in an eXist database and are realized via XQuery and XSLT as HTML for the online user. The project lasted from 2005-2009.

div.head: Hosoda 1991: 183-186
div.p: From Noriaki Hosoda 細田典明: Bonbun Zōagongyō Busshosetsuhon Gedōsōō (3) [Sanskrit fragments from the Parivrājakasaṃyukta of the Saṃyuktāgama (3) 梵文《雑阿含経》仏所說品外道相応(Ⅲ)]. Hokkaido Journal of Indological and Buddhist Studies《印度哲学仏教学》6: 172-191. This is part of the text-cluster of BZA (T.100) sutra 205.

div.note: 「上座経」 Bl.170 V3-172 V2: Pīṭha(?)（パーリ・ニカーヤに対応経無し。）;『雑含』第九七一経、『別訳』第二〇五経「重床」（経においては「重巣」。）
div.p: §1 (II bhagavān rājagṛhe viharatiシラブル数から勘案すると、この冒頭句は省略されていると考えられる。veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe. tena khalu samayena tasmin rājagṛhe pīṭho nāmaḥ parivrājakaḥ prativasati) sumāgadhāyāḫ(V4)puṣkariṇyās tī[r]e﹙.﹚ (sa evaṃ pariṣadi vācaṃ bhāṣate. ……………… yo me sacet) tāṃ(V5)gāthāṃ gītam anugāsyati (tasyāham antike brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyāmīti.)

§2 (atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ) piṇḍāya(R1)prāviśan﹙.﹚ aśrauṣuḥ (saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ, asmiṃ rājagṛhe sumāgadhāyāḥsumāgadhāyāḥ...tīre: シラブル数と漢訳の対比から補う。puṣkaraṇyās tīre pīṭho nāmaḥ parivrā)jakaḫ(R2)prativasati﹙.﹚ sa evaṃ pa(riṣadi vācaṃ bhāṣate. pūrvavat. ekānte nyaṣīdan. ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bha)gavantam(R3)idam avocan*.
§3 iha (vayaṃ bhadanta pūrvavat. adhivāsayati bhagavān saṃbahulānāṃ bhikṣūnāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhavena.)

§4 (atha bhagavān sāyā)hne(R4)pratisaṃlayanād vyu[tthā](ya yena pīṭhaḥ parivrā jakaḥ sumāgadhāyāḥsumāgadhāyāḥ...tīre: シラブル数と漢訳の対比から補う。puṣkaraṇyās tīre tenopajagāma. adrākṣīt pīṭhaḥ parivrājako bhagavantaṃ dūrata)[e]va﹙.﹚(R5)dṛṣṭvā ca puna(r bhagavato 'rthāyāsanaṃ prajñapayaty evaṃ cāha. niṣīdatāṃ bhagavān prajñapta evāsane. nyaṣīdad bhagavān prajñapta evāsa)[ne﹙.﹚](B1.171)niṣadya bhagavāṃ pīṭh(aṃ parivrājakam idam avocat.)
§5 (satyaṃ khalu tvaṃ pīṭha, evaṃ vadasi. …… yo me sacet tāṃ gāthāṃ gītam anugāsyati tasyā)ham(V2)antike brahmacaryaṃ cari(ṣyāmīti. ………. ahaṃ tāṃ gāthāṃ gītam anugāṣyāmi.)
§6 (atha pīṭhaḥ pa)rivrājakāḥ(V3)pīṭhasyopari pīṭh[aṃ] …… (tasyāṃ velāyaṃ gāthāṃ babhāṣe || )
§7 (atha bhagavān cetasā pīthasya parivarājakasya cittam ājñāya tasyāṃ) velāyāṃ(R1)gāthāṃ babhāṣe ||
§8 (atha pīṭhasya parivrājakasya etad abhavad i)ti(R4)me śramaṇo gautamaś cet(asā cittam ājānāti. …… yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat.)

§9 (la)[bhe]yāhaṃ(R5)bho gauta(ma svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam. labdhavāṃ te svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam. evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa) (pī)[ṭh](a)ḥ(B1.172)parivrājaka(ḥ yasyārthe kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti. pūrvavad yāvad a)[rhan](V2)babhūva suvimu(ktacittaḥ. pīṭha iti sūtraṃ || )
